definitions.definition: A mixture of two or more things.
definitions.example: Our department has a good blend of experienced workers and young promise.

definitions.definition: A word formed by combining two other words; a grammatical contamination, portmanteau word.
To mingle; to mix; to unite intimately; to pass or shade insensibly into each other.
definitions.example: To make hummus you need to blend chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice and garlic.

definitions.definition: To pollute by mixture or association; to spoil or corrupt; to blot; to stain.
